abstract: Seattle gun control legislation draws lawsuit from NRA and others, who claim measure, containing 'gun violence tax,' contradicts Washington  State law.
lead_paragraph: The National Rifle Association sued Seattle on Monday over its adoption this month of a “gun violence tax” as well as mandatory reporting of lost or stolen firearms.

headline.main: Washington: Gun Groups Sue Over Tax
headline.print_headline: Washington: Gun Groups Sue Over Tax

snippet: The National Rifle Association sued Seattle on Monday over its adoption this month of a “gun violence tax” as well as mandatory reporting of lost or stolen firearms.
